item.name: Krabby Patty
item.dialogue: Thanks Mr Krabs. I'll definitely need Krabby Patties along the way.

item.name: House Fancy Magazine
item.dialogue: The latest edition of that magazine that Squidward is always reading.

item.name: Mrs. Puff's Boat Keys
item.dialogue: Boat keys? Who could these belong to?/I'll hold onto them for now.

item.name: Shiny Washer
item.dialogue: This shiny Washer must have fallen off of Mrs. Puff's boat./I sure hope it wasn't important.

item.name: Lemonade
item.dialogue: It looks delicious, but I'll hang onto this Lemonade for now.

item.name: Mailbag
item.dialogue: It's the Mailbag with everyone's mail in it.

item.name: Free Medical Coupon
item.dialogue: A Medical Coupon/Good for one free check-up.

item.name: Sugar Free Donut
item.dialogue: This Donut is sugarfree but still delicious./(*may contain a source of phenylalanine)

item.name: Reef Blower
item.dialogue: The Reef Blower can clear away unwanted piles of sand,/and will knock back any hostiles I might encounter.

item.name: Patty-pult
item.dialogue: Some sort of patty launching device./I'll call it the Patty-pult!/I can use for self-defense and even trigger switches from a distance.

item.name: William Krabs' Journal 1
item.dialogue: It's an extract from William Krabs' journal./Apparently, the treasure was taken to Dead Eye Jail, through ANOTHER secret cave/hidden behind a boulder at the other end of Goo Lagoon beach.

item.name: William Krabs' Journal 2
item.dialogue: Another extract from William Krabs' journal. The treasure is burried in Dead Eye Mine!/There's an entrance to the mine on the outskirts of town,/through the Jellyfish Fields.

item.name: William Krabs' Treasure
item.dialogue: I need to get the treasure back to Mr Krabs immediately, he's going to be so happy./Hey, maybe I'll get a promotion to "Chief Krabby Patty Flipper"./Squidward would be so pleased.

item.name: Foam Hand
item.dialogue: A big foam hand, great for karate chopping!
